title: Vishwambhari
extract:
Vishwambhari Maa is Goddess of Karma.She is Prakriti. She is the supreme being.Also known and referred as the Adi Shakti. Adi shakti or Prakriti divided into three parts in the beginning of universe first being Maa Saraswati, second Maa Laxmi and third Maa Parvati. Vishwambhari Maa and Parbramh(परब्रह्म) is the creator of the entire Universe. She is the one who created the many species reciding on this planet. Maa says "The real temple is within you. Stop searching for it in the outer world. By your deeds and values you can make your home a Temple. Give away superstition and Blind Faith. Do your Karma in the most righteous manner." Vishwambhari Maa wants the sanctity of Nature and Culture to be maintained.
